DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Compare progression-free survival patient primary soft tissue sarcoma retroperitoneum pelvis treat surgery v without preoperative radiotherapy . Secondary - Compare toxicity complication associate regimens patient . - Compare rate microscopically complete surgical resection patient treat regimen . - Compare overall survival rate patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord tumor grade ( low [ G1 ] v intermediate [ G2 ] vs high [ G3/4 ] ) , tumor size ( < 15 cm v ≥ 15 cm ) , tumor histology ( liposarcoma v non-liposarcoma ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients undergo surgery . - Arm II : Patients undergo preoperative radiotherapy daily , 5 day week , 5.5 week . Within 28-63 day completion radiotherapy , patient undergo surgery . In arm , treatment continue absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow 28 day , 4 month , every 6 month 5 year , annually 5 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 370 patient ( 185 per treatment arm ) accrue study within 4.5 year .
